desc: 엘레멘트가 가진 공격적인 힘을 봉인하는 특성이 있는 특수한 돌.

dictionary.lore: This special stone contains special elemental attack properties. It's relatively easy to find in Elgaia, but there are no reports of it in Grand Gaia. Many researchers think they have been exhausted in Grand Gaia due to them having been used in great numbers to make atack stones.

name: 장명석
